product_description: Path upcycles more plastic waste than any other chair in the industry.
recyclable_percentage_description: Humanscale products are designed for disassembly and recycling at the end of life. Humanscale products are also designed to last long and can be reused.
recyclable_offcuts_description: This does not apply to Humanscale products, and our packaging is recyclable.
recycled_content_description:
53% total recycled content (42% Post-consumer recycled and 11% Pre-consumer recycled)

See here: https://humanscale.ecomedes.com/products/humanscale/path
recycling_process_description: For more information, see design for environment https://www.humanscale.com/userfiles/file/desing-for-environment.pdf
reusable_description: Humanscale products are designed for disassembly and recycling at EOL. Humanscale products are also designed to last long and can be reused.
end_of_life_program_description: Humanscale offers our circularity program called "BEAM" in which we take back our customers' products at the end of the product's life.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, 100% of the water used in the Dublin facility is on-site harvested rainwater. Path, sold in the APAC market, is manufactured in Dublin, Ireland.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: idling avoidance procedures on ocean freight
minimisation_design_strategy: This does not apply to Humanscale products, and our packaging is recyclable.
modern_slavery_comments: Each year, we evaluate our first tier suppliers for risk of child labor, forced labor or restriction to freedom of association and human rights, based on their location and type of operation. Our on-site audit plan is developed to prioritize suppliers with greater risk of non-compliance.
factory_finished_description:
Frame: Black recycled plastic OR light grey recycled plastic. Frame options: Polished aluminium with black OR polished aluminium with light grey.
Upholstery: Available in FormSense Eco Knit™, Lotus fabric, and chrome-free leathers

manufacturing_locations.location_name: Shizhong District, Jinan, Jinan, Shandong, China
Shizhong District, Jinan, Jinan, Shandong, China

other_comments: The Path chair is certified "Declare Red List Free."
type_of_packaging: Path chair is packaged in recycled FSC-certified cardboard packaging of at least 72% post-consumer recycled content and a recyclable polybag. Alternatively, Path can be shipped in optional blanket wrapping, which is returnable and reusable and avoids the need for cardboard packaging.

recycling_process_description: For more information, see Design for Environment (DfE) https://www.humanscale.com/userfiles/file/desing-for-environment.pdf
reusable_description: Humanscale products are designed for disassembly and recycling at EOL. Humanscale products are also designed to last long and can be reused.
end_of_life_program_description: Humanscale offers our circularity program called "BEAM" in which we take back our customers' products at the end of the life of the product.
water_reduction_techniques: Based on the location of product manufacturing, 100% of the water used in the Piscataway facility is on-site harvested rainwater. Trea, sold in the APAC market, can either be manufactured in Tenwin, China, or in Piscataway, NJ, USA.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Idling avoidance procedures on ocean freight
minimisation_design_strategy: This does not apply to Humanscale products, and our packaging is recyclable.
modern_slavery_comments: Each year, we evaluate our first tier suppliers for risk of child labor, forced labor or restriction to freedom of association and human rights, based on their location and type of operation. Our on-site audit plan is developed to prioritize suppliers with greater risk of non-compliance.
factory_finished_description:
Frame: White powder coat, Base: four legs, cantilever, lite task, four-star OR lite stool with foot ring  Options: With upholosted seat pad, drafting, and caster options. Upholstery options: house textiles, chrome-free leathers, and a selection of Kvadrat textiles. 
See website for full range of finish options.
other_comments:
1. The Trea chair is certified "Declare Red List Free"
2. LCA and LPC are specific to products manufactured in the Humanscale facility in Piscataway-NJ-USA.  Trea, sold in the APAC market, can be manufactured at Humanscale or partner facilities.
3. The locations of manufacturing processes of major components are provided for one of the partner facilities. Based on where the product is manufactured, the locations of manufacturing processes of major components will vary.

product_description: The Float Mini accommodates each user’s work style, by encouraging natural movement
recyclable_percentage_description: Humanscale products are designed for disassembly and recycling at the end of life. Humanscale products are also designed to last long and can be reused.
recyclable_offcuts_description: This does not apply to Humanscale products, and our packaging is recyclable.
recycling_process_description: For more information, see Design for Environment (DfE) https://www.humanscale.com/userfiles/file/desing-for-environment.pdf
reusable_description: Humanscale products are designed for disassembly and recycling at EOL. Humanscale products are also designed to last long and can be reused.
end_of_life_program_description: Humanscale offers our circularity program called "BEAM," in which we connect our customers to an end-of-life vendor who can sustainably decommission the product at the end of life.
water_reduction_techniques: Yes, 100% of the water used in Humanscale's Piscataway facility is on-site harvested rainwater. Float Mini, sold in the APAC market, is manufactured in PIscatway, NJ.
minimisation_design_strategy: This does not apply to Humanscale products, and our packaging is recyclable.
modern_slavery_comments: Each year, we evaluate our first tier suppliers for risk of child labor, forced labor or restriction to freedom of association and human rights, based on their location and type of operation. Our on-site audit plan is developed to prioritize suppliers with greater risk of non-compliance.
factory_finished_description: Worksurface Material: Eco-friendly Bamboo, Powder-Coated MDF, Natural Linoleum. Base: Powder-coated. Caster wheels are also available for added portability
other_comments: Float Mini does not utilise any harmful Red List chemicals, such as formaldehyde. In addition, we chose to use bamboo for the work surface as opposed to traditional wood. Bamboo takes less than 10 years to replenish, making it the more planet-friendly option. By comparison, the wood used in standard tops comes from old-growth forests, which can take up to 100 years to regrow.
type_of_packaging: information not readily available
